alert.note: Alert for Houston (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 09 at 9:52AM EST until March 09 at 10:15AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EST FOR SOUTHWESTERN TWIGGS AND NORTHEASTERN HOUSTON COUNTIES... At 952 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kathleen, or 9 miles northeast of Perry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warner Robins, Robins Air Force Base, Tarversville, Sand Bed, Bullard, Bonaire and Kathleen. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
